name: End-Ender
description:
A game where you travel through space and time to stop apocalypses.

This (Brackeys 2023.1) is my first time completing a game jam! I appreciate any feedback and hope you had fun making your game as well!

Controls:
  • W, Space          -     Fly forwards
  • A/D                     -     Turn left/right
  • Right-click     -     Shoot plasma bolt
  • Left-click        -     Shoot boost beam
  • Backspace     -     Travel back in time
  • R                          -     Reset level
  • Escape             -     Quit game (not pause!)
Collaborate with your past self

Every time you die or press backspace, you travel back in time to the start of the level, and your past self will still be there! Perhaps, if ending ends on your own is too hard, you two can work together...

End Ends!

The game features 4 levels, each of which represents a possible apocalypse.
When you're tired of ruminating about the fate of the real world, you can play End-Enders to defeat colourful, cartoony, beatable versions of some ways the world can end.


Hints (spoilers): Spoilers

The game gives you some cryptic hints already, but when you're really stuck, this section will just give you the answers. These are not the only ways to beat every level, but they work.
Do not read beyond this point if you don't want spoilers.

  • Level 1: Fly right next to the black hole and fire boost beams up into the gravity field. Then, travel back in time and use your own boost beams to boost yourself to the other side.
  • Level 2: Shoot as many meteors as you can, then repeatedly travel back in time so you can shoot even more meteors in the limited window before the Earth is destroyed.  It works best if you divide your selves up between locations. For example, first you go left, then right, then middle, then really high, etc.
  • Level 3: Just wait until someone starts firing missiles for no reason. There are 5 bunkers, make sure to watch them all. When you see someone firing missiles, either intercept the missiles and destroy them immediately, or travel back in time to destroy them before they can even fire.
  • Level 4: Mercury is going to get yeeted into the top-left corner, where it will die. Gently intercept it with your boost beams before it gets there.
    If you do this, the level will instead end with Mars and Jupiter crashing into each other, also in the top-left corner. Travel back in time and make sure Mars (or Jupiter) never gets there.
    Throughout the level, try to be gentle with the planets, don't get caught on the solar waves yourself, and reset if things get messy. The biggest danger is that you create more problems than you solve.

Good luck, End-Ender!
